name: Bubble connect
description:
The shower has gone insane!

The shower doesn't work proprely anymore! It is spreading dust all arround the bath... luckily, you have your soap, sponge and rubber duck that will help you clean off the mess: by connecting soap bubbles, redirect the dust particles on your very loved toys. GREY DUST GOES IN THE BORDER.

Like... really insane

After some cleanup, the shower will become possessed and will move really fast through the ceiling, spreading evil dust that your bath toys can't handle. RED DUST GOES IN THE CENTER. During this period, the cleaned off dust is worth 2 times a regular dust. Try staying in the frenzy state as long as possible!
